scripts.build:github: BUILD_ENV=github npm run build && npm-run-all cp:*
scripts.cp:react: shx mkdir -p out/starter/react && shx cp -r ../packages/starter/react/create-react-app-example/build/. out/starter/react/.
scripts.cp:svelte: shx mkdir -p out/starter/svelte && shx cp -r ../packages/starter/svelte/svelte-kit-example/build/. out/starter/svelte/.
